UVI.product_version: versions from v2.6.34 to before v4.4.271
UVI.description:
net: usb: fix memory leak in smsc75xx_bind

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.271 by commit 200dbfcad8011e50c3cec269ed7b980836eeb1fa, it was introduced in version v2.6.34 by commit d0cad871703b898a442e4049c532ec39168e5b57. For more details please see the references link.
